mapper.select: select m.mem_no, m.mem_id,c.chef_regdate,m.mem_email from rpatest c, member_info m where m.mem_email=c.mem_email and m.mem_grade_no='일반인' and m.mem_no in (select mem_no from recipe_info group by mem_no having count(mem_no)>=1) order by chef_regdate desc
mapper.update: update member_info set mem_grade_no ='쉐프' where mem_email=#{mem_email}
